sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import { GET_ORDERS } from 'graphql/query/order.query'; import ErrorMessage from 'components/error-message/error-message'; import OrderReceivedWrapper, { OrderReceivedContainer, OrderInfo, OrderDetails, TotalAmount, BlockTitle, Text, InfoBlockWrapper, InfoBlock, ListItem, ListTitle, ListDes, } from './order-received.style'; import { FormattedMessage } from 'react-intl'; type OrderReceivedProps = { data?: any; index?: Number; Router?: any; }; const OrderReceived: React.FunctionComponent = (props) => { const router = useRouter() const { data, error, loading } = useQuery(GET_ORDERS); if (loading) { return }; if (error) { return ( ); }; const ids = data.getUserOrders.map(el => el.id); const index = ids.indexOf(router.query.itemId); const myOrder = data.getUserOrders[index]; const printHandler = () =>{ if (typeof window !== 'undefined') { window.print() } } return ( Print Invoice {myOrder.order_code} {myOrder.datetime.split('2020').shift()} {myOrder.total} 6 Items {myOrder.delivery_method.details} {myOrder.delivery_address} {myOrder.sub_total} {myOrder.payment_method} {myOrder.total} ); }; export default OrderReceived;
